div.a: Caring On Stolen Time: A Nursing Home Diary

div.div: "I work in a place of death. People come here to die, and my co-workers and I care for them as they make their journeys."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14FQsvs&via=Digg&text=Caring On Stolen Time: A Nursing Home Diary

div.a: Facebook Error Takes Down Countless Major Websites

div.div: CNN, BuzzFeed, The Washington Post, Gawker and others were all effectively taken offline on Thursday evening. A mysterious bug with a common factor: Facebook.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbbP5e&via=Digg&text=Facebook Error Takes Down Countless Major Websites

div.a: What And How Do U-2 Spy Plane Pilots Eat During Their 12 Hour Missions?

div.div: Here's a fascinating look at what and how the USAF's finest pilots eat while flying America's favorite spy plane: the A-12.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0lBWA&via=Digg&text=What And How Do U-2 Spy Plane Pilots Eat During Their 12 Hour Missions?

div.a: Japan's Competition To See Who Can Shave The Thinnest Piece Of Wood

div.div: My literal jaw literally dropped when I saw how thin the shavings are: 9 microns! A micron is one-millionth of a meter or one-thousandth of a millimeter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YHu6X2&via=Digg&text=Japan's Competition To See Who Can Shave The Thinnest Piece Of Wood

div.a: Stan Lee Is A Legend. But Not For The Reasons You Think

div.div: It’s largely because of his division of labor—which has since come to be called “The Marvel Method”—that Lee’s status as the Beloved All-Father of Modern Comics discomfits fans and comics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UHgyxA&via=Digg&text=Stan Lee Is A Legend. But Not For The Reasons You Think

div.a: The Killer LAPD Cop's Crazy Facebook Manifesto

div.div: Christopher Jordan Dorner, the 33-year-old ex-LAPD officer who allegedly killed a young Los Angeles couple on Sunday in revenge for his termination from the force, is only getting started, according to a rambling manifesto, alternately terrifying and bizarre, that he posted to Facebook earlier this week.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X9L3dq&via=Digg&text=The Killer LAPD Cop's Crazy Facebook Manifesto

div.div: Believe it or not, the competition for the title of world's most traveled man is hotly contested.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xot3ui&via=Digg&text=The World's Most Traveled Man

div.div: TV producer Gene Roddenberry's optimistic vision of the future has captivated fans for nearly a half-century.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X9rYrV&via=Digg&text=The Evolution Of 'Star Trek'

div.div: From American socialism to German hyperinflation to worldwide vulture capitalism, the strange and shifting lessons of a favorite board game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YHuiFM&via=Digg&text=The Economics Behind Monopoly

div.a: How The NFL Could Have Avoided A Super Bowl Blackout According To An Amazon Engineer

div.div: The guy charged with keeping Amazon’s data centers up and running says that the NFL could have avoided its blackout black eye for the price of about two-and-a-half Super Bowl ads.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YcpTsv&via=Digg&text=How The NFL Could Have Avoided A Super Bowl Blackout According To An Amazon Engineer

div.div: These snow throwers include a two stage impeller and side mounted rotating brushes to throw snow up to 200 feet. They can also remove 3,000 tons of snow an hour.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VG9MD4&via=Digg&text=The MTA's Snow-Fighting Equipment

div.a: Putin And Medvedev Are Fighting Over What Time It Is

div.div: Former Russian President Dmitry Medvedev dropped two of his country's 11 time zones and eliminated daylight savings time. Now current President Vladimir Putin wants to revert back. Let the fight begin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFs4td&via=Digg&text=Putin And Medvedev Are Fighting Over What Time It Is

div.a: You Still Don't Know What Really Killed The Dinosaurs

div.div: “An asteroid 65 million years ago” is no longer enough.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WwYWmS&via=Digg&text=You Still Don't Know What Really Killed The Dinosaurs

div.a: Leo DiCaprio And Jonah Hill High-Five Over Swimming With Topless Woman

div.div: While Leoardo DiCaprio and Jonah Hill seem to have some hang-ups when it comes to their body images, both swimming in shirts, their female compatriot certainly does not.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YHof46&via=Digg&text=Leo DiCaprio And Jonah Hill High-Five Over Swimming With Topless Woman

div.a: Brazilian Cops Have Arrested Three John Lennons In Two Months

div.div: The city of Belo Horizonte 's beset by an unusual crime spree by criminals who all named for Beatles legend John Lennon.

div.a: Soccer In The World's Most Violent City

div.div: "I sat back down 15 minutes before kickoff and a hoard of riot police walked onto the field in masks, carrying shields, guns, and wearing neon-vests. Oh, yeah. The soccer game."

div.a: How The Gun-Control Movement Got Smart

div.div: Why are advocates so optimistic now when reform has failed so many times before? Because they have a totally new strategy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UEaohD&via=Digg&text=How The Gun-Control Movement Got Smart

div.a: The Surprising Chinese Origins Of Common English Phrases

div.div: English derives the bulk of its vocabulary from French, German and an assortment of other world languages. But we don’t often think of China — which is half a world away from England — as influencing our speech.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YWFQsy&via=Digg&text=The Surprising Chinese Origins Of Common English Phrases

div.div: You might want to hate on some of these, but you can't. They're just too smooth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/122RHBD&via=Digg&text=The Easiest Bar Tricks

div.a: The Weird Coating That Could Save Your Next Smartphone

div.div: In 2009, the iPhone 3GS advertised an “oleophobic” screen to stop smudging. This is the next step.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1JQoi&via=Digg&text=The Weird Coating That Could Save Your Next Smartphone

div.a: The Newest Wedding Trend Is Kind Of Cruel

div.div: Careful: That e-mail from your newly engaged friend may be just the bearer of bad news. It could be to kindly not request your presence at their wedding.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XSbZN4&via=Digg&text=The Newest Wedding Trend Is Kind Of Cruel

div.a: The World's First 'Moveable City' Now Operational In Antarctica

div.div: Call it this generation’s “Walking City.” Halley VI, the latest iteration of Britain’s Halley Antarctic research stations, is now fully operational—and it walks, sort of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UEHEp2&via=Digg&text=The World's First 'Moveable City' Now Operational In Antarctica

div.div: It just can’t attract the talent that private industry can.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYKCS0&via=Digg&text=Why Government Should Outsource Technology

div.div: This is straight out of an episode of Mr. Bean or Austin Powers: a driver in a tiny car tries to make a U-turn on an even tinier street in Naples and gets stuck.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YGKLtK&via=Digg&text=The World's Zaniest U-Turn

div.a: What Happens When You're Allergic To Hair Dye

div.div: Grecian Formula might be able to cover up greys, but nothing can cover up this type of violent reaction to hair dye.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YWuTHA&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You're Allergic To Hair Dye

div.a: Kai The Homeless Hitchhiker Masterfully Remixed

div.div: Kai the Home-free Hitchhiker sings an uplifting anthem about the elemental worth of a human soul, while warning of the smashing & smiting that he may bestow upon those that ignore this basic moral precept.

div.a: China's Top Guns Are Getting Much Better

div.div: In terms of authenticity, China’s pretend air battles are getting pretty close to the real thing. That improving realism, combined with Beijing’s new fighters and other hardware, has some observers in the U.S. feeling uneasy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12vEea6&via=Digg&text=China's Top Guns Are Getting Much Better

div.a: The Nuclear Option: Batman, Iron Man, And Attitudes Toward Power

div.div: One major correspondence between the two blockbusters is also either a baffling coincidence or an incredible synchronicity (or both): they each have the same damn ending.
